snippet: The N.H.L. suspended the Toronto Maple Leafs’ Nazem Kadri for four games for a hit to the head of Edmonton’s Matt Fraser on Monday.
abstract: NHL suspends Toronto Maple Leafs center Nazem Kadri four games for head-shot on Edmonton Oilers winger Matt Fraser.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. suspended the Toronto Maple Leafs’ Nazem Kadri for four games for a hit to the head of Edmonton’s Matt Fraser on Monday.

headline.main: Toronto Maple Leafs Player Suspended Four Games
